timeline.title: QA Tester/System Integrator

timeline.title: QA Tester/Technical Support Engineer

timeline.description2: Optimized application performance by maintaining the GUI web interface.
timeline.description3: Recognized for proactive incident resolution and efficient escalation procedures.
